TunableList.name: COMPATIBILITY_LEVEL_ICONS_MAP
TunableList.description: A mapping of Compatibility levels to the icons used in the UI.

TunableTuple.name: value
TunableTuple.description: A tuple of the icons and text that represent this CompatibilityLevel in the UI.

Tunable.name: descriptive_text
Tunable.description: Descriptive text for this Compatibility level, used for various tooltips.

Tunable.name: icon
Tunable.description: The larger of the two icons for this CompatibilityLevel. This is used for the Relationship tooltip and Sim Profile panel.

Tunable.name: small_icon
Tunable.description: The smaller of the two icons for this CompatibilityLevel. This is used for the Sim portraits in the Relationship panel and Sim Picker.

TunableList.name: COMPATIBILITY_LEVEL_LOOT_MAP
TunableList.description: A mapping of Compatibility levels to loot that will be applied whenever there is a level change.

Tunable.name: value
Tunable.description: The loot to applied to the Sim upon CompatibilityLevel update.

TunableList.name: COMPATIBILITY_LEVEL_THRESHOLDS
TunableList.description: A mapping of Compatibility levels to the Compatibility score interval.

TunableTuple.name: value
TunableTuple.description: The score interval that this level corresponds to.

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: The lower bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: The upper bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: COMPATIBILITY_SCORE_DEFAULT
Tunable.description: The default score that all Compatibility scores start at.

TunableTuple.name: COMPATIBILITY_SCORE_RANGE
TunableTuple.description: The acceptable max/min bounds for a Compatibility score.

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: The lower bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: The upper bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: NPC_PREFERENCE_COUNT_MAX
Tunable.description: The max number of Preference traits an NPC may be assigned.

TunableList.name: NPC_PREFERENCE_LOOT
TunableList.description: Loots to apply to NPCs when setting up their Preferences. This allows Preference traits to be assigned randomly, but (ideally) weighted against the Sim's existing traits.
